name: woof
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the sound that a dog makes: "Miaow, miaow," went the cat. "Woof, woof," went the dog. With a loud woof, the dog came bounding towards them.
More examplesFewer examplesThe only sound was the distant woof of a dog.She could imitate her dogs' woofs so closely that people couldn't tell the difference.Some dog owners claim they know the meaning of their pet's woofs, growls, and whines.

If a dog woofs, it makes a sound with its voice: Suddenly the dogs all started woofing. If these dogs are woofing at you, it's because they are afraid of you.
More examplesFewer examplesThat stupid dog has been woofing all night.Our dog is very friendly - he woofs and wags his tail for anyone.The dog came bounding down the hall, woofing a welcome.
